name: Baldi's Basics in Quarantine & More: Public Demo Edition!
name_original: Baldi's Basics in Quarantine & More: Public Demo Edition!
description: It's like the original version, but in the public demo! The story is the same like in the original version except you have to collect 8 hand sanitizers instead of the original 7 and you're at the public demo schoolhouse. Play now!
